member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.FileInputOutputException
member.summary: Collects file upload related exception. Added by Atul Patel 07/02/2004.

member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.RecordNotFoundException
member.summary: This exception will be thrown if one is trying to access persistable domain object with the key which no more exists in database.Added by Tanuj Narula on 04-July-2004.

member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.OverFlowException
member.summary: This exception will be thrown while checking the object's maximum capacity for data storage. Added by Tanuj Narula on 04-July-2004.

member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.XmlOperationException
member.summary: This exception will be thrown if some Xml related exception occurs. Added by Tanuj Narula on 04-July-2004.

member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.RegistryOperationException
member.summary: Handles the exceptions generated while accesing the windows registry. Added by Aashish Bhateja on 04-July-2004.

member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.InvalidValueException
member.summary: This exception will be thrown if some invalid parameter value is passed to a method Added by Neelima on 16-August-2004.

member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.StringException
member.summary: Handles the exceptions generated while string manipulations. Added by Sumeet on 24-August-2004.

member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.ConnectionStringInitializationException
member.summary: Handles the exceptions generated while initializing the connection string. Invalid Login information is input. Added by Neelima on 6-October-2004.

member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.ExecSummaryReportEngineException
member.summary: Handles the exceptions that would be raised while generating the executive summary report. Added by Neelima on 6-October-2004.

member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.InvalidCriteriaException
member.summary: Handles the exceptions that would be generated whenever any invalid criterion is encountered for the report. Added by Neelima on 6-October-2004.

member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.AbortRequestedException
member.summary: Handles the exceptions that would be generated whenever report generation gets aborted. Added by Neelima on 6-October-2004.

member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.SysExDataNotFoundException
member.summary: Thrown when data is not found under 'SysExData' node

member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.PermissionViolationException
member.summary: PermissionViolationException was designed to be caught and formatted appropriately.

member.name: T:Riskmaster.ExceptionTypes.ExtensibilityException
member.summary: Thrown when data is not found under 'SysExData' node
